transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Ha Krishna sir.

Executive: Ha Krishna sir, sollunga sir.

Customer: Krishna pesura India mart le irunthu Rohini manager pesuranu sonnanga.

Executive: Eppadi sir?

Customer: Krishna pesuran sir India mart le irunthu Rohini manager pesuran appadi pesitanga anna.

Executive: Aama aama sir sollunga sir.

Customer: Intha sir antha complaint post pannurathukku permission koduthanga athai konjam post panniduren.

Executive: Sir ungalukku ungaludaiya voice enakku clear ah illa sollunga sir.

Customer: Okay ngala?

Executive: Ha okay okay sollunga sir.

Customer: Anna sir antha complaint post pannikalam endra ketanga athai close pannikalama thane namma team pesuranga appadiya?

Executive: Athan close athan enna ketanga athai ithai naan raise panna antha complaint thane sonninga.

Customer: Aama aama innoru vishayam sir ippo eppadi poittu irukku sir athai close pannikkiren.

Customer: Ippo eppadi poittu irukku sir business?

Executive: Athu enakku antha rendu ithu enakku refund pannittingala sir?

Customer: Entha sir puriyala.

Customer: Antha rendu buylead enakku refund aayiducha?

Executive: Buylead engalukku automatic ah illa inga Friday ngala?

Executive: Athu innikku vanthu Friday Tuesday Saturday ungalukku vanthu automatic reverse aayirum ungalukku.

Customer: Illa sir illa sir naan antha complaint raise pannirunthaen paathingala?

Executive: Aama sir aama sir.

Customer: Antha rendu buylead vanthu actually athu vanthu athu useless ah irunthathu athu buylead enakku suggestion irunthathukko athai use panna antha buylead vanthu enakku antha requirement illainnathunala thaan naan antha complaint eh raise pannirunthaen.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: Athavathu ippo avangalukku requirement irunthu ennala negotiate pannamula illa product illa sorry ennodaiya product thevai illainna vera but avangalukku antha requirement eh illa.

Customer: Ippo nammalukku requirement intha maari onnu irukku nu solli vanthathunala thaane naan complaint raise panna athu illainnathunala thaan complaint raise panna.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: So athunala antha waste aachu antha buylead athunala enakku athai refund panniningala illa eppadi athai kekkiren.

Executive: Illa ippo antha ovvoru buylead refund option vanthu kidaiyaathu sir enna nadakkum appidina ippo for example customer vanthu requirement post pannanga nu veingalen.

Executive: Antha need irukku endra India mart le lead post pannitanga correct ngala?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Ippo market le evvalavo products irukku yen particular ah namma product kku vanthu avanga unga India mart le varanum correct ngala enna nadanthirukku appidina.

Executive: One onna nammaloda better ahna pricing market le market le kidaikka chance irunthirukku onnu.

Executive: Innonnu already vanthu antha lead kulla close ah irukka chance irukku.

Executive: Ippo namma paathingana oru buylead naalu perthu anju perthukku poguthu.

Executive: Ippo for example naan inga solla rendu vishayam rendu vishayathula ethavathu oru vishayama irunthirukkum onnu deal illa ippo avar illa avar enna na ippo oru oru customer vanthu naan enakku requirement athu illa enna na naane vanthu antha business thaan start panna poren so athunala paathu kittu irunthaen oru customer udayathu.

Customer: Okay.

Customer: So oru customer naan vanthu manufacturing panna poren.

Customer: So athukkaaga vanthu paathu kittu irunthaen enna appidi nu material kaaga paathu irunthaen nu sonnathu oru oru customer innoru thar vanthu coffee day vachirunthathu but CCD vachirukkaanga but aana avangalukku vanthu cups requirement illa and avar antha position le illaiya antha enquiries kku vanthu avar vanthu athu antha ithu vanthu antha purchase ithu vanthu avar athu purchase ithu kidaiyaathaan.

Customer: So neenga call pannurathu enakku ithaa irukku enna naan vanthu engalukku purchase ithula naan kidaiyaathu naan antha requirement ithuvum post pannala or antha need need eh kidaiyaathu.

Executive: Okay appidi nu so athunala thaan naan raise panna naan customer kitta athai pesittu athu ippo naan enakku buylead use pannurathu enna athu ivvalavu naal naan ithunala intha maari pannathu illa.

Executive: So eppo vanthu intha maari nammalukku list out aagurathula namma oru list out aaguthu appo antha buylead customer kku vanthu namma product maariyo illa namma product related ah edho onno illa namma pesurathukku munnadi negotiation mudichirukkalaam deal eh mudichirukkalaam illa eppidi naalum irukkalaam athu customer pesurathule nammalukku therinjirum customer solliruvaanga appidi nu.

Customer: Aama so ithu enna na appidi illa appidi namakku India mart le irunthu athu list out aaga pannathunala thaan namma use pannurom.

Executive: Antha yaanathu vanthu nammalukku proper ah irunthiruntha ippo nammalukku proper na unmaile avangalukku antha customer kku antha antha requirement irunthirunthu nammalaala antha business convert panna mudiyala na athu vera but antha requirement illaathathukku namma athai eduthathu waste ah pochu appo namma useful ah vera ethukkaavathu ullathula namma try panni paarkkalaam illa use panni paarkkalaam ippidi athu waste aayiduchu nammalukku athu thaan.

Customer: Athan sir ippo enna na athukku complaint raise pannurathukku sambandham kidaiyaathu sir ippo enna appidina for example neenga enna pannuringa appidina further ah inime leads edukkurathukku munnadi antha lead eppidi productive ah irukkanum nu naan solren paarunga.

Executive: Ippo oru lead consume pannurathukku munnadi anga contact buyer nu oru option irukkum athukku mela vanthu paathu contact buyer aama aama contact buyer aama athu thaan vanthu they are going to consume a buylead correct ngala ippo naan enna solren na athukku mela antha antha lead post pannurathule buyer vanthu evvalavu naala India mart le irukkaanga enna for example oru individual ah illa vanthu oru firm le irunthu buylead post pannuraangala multiple options kaamikku correct ngala GST verified antha maari options la kaamikku.

Customer: Sari sir.

Executive: Puriyuthu sir ippo naan oru example kku namma call mudichathukku appuram intha neenga sonna complaint close pannathukku appuram kooda naan screenshot anuppuren paarunga antha maari buyleads ah most ah paathu prefer panni consume pannunga.

Executive: Yenna oru lead vanthu individual um post pannalaam oru firm le irunthu post pannalaam correct ngala namma focused buyers ellame vanthu paathingana individuals kidaiyaathu.

Executive: Sari sir sari sir namma firm correct ngala individuals yaarum namma individuals yaarum namma product vaanga maattaanga vaanguvaanga aana namakku margin kammiya irukkum sari sir sari sir yaaru na antha product ah vaangi sell pannuraanga.

Executive: Manufacturer namma irukkom retailers appuram vanthu wholesalers appuram vanthu mediators correct ngala athunala enna solren appidina athula buylead le kaamikku option eh naan ungalukku namma call mudichittu intha mudichathukku appuram oru feedback um varum antha feedback kooda kodunga antha pathina feedback kooda varum athukku appuram oru screenshot naan share panna antha maari buyleads ah paathu further ah neenga consume pannunga ithu inime entha doubt ah irunthaalum en WhatsApp number kooda message pannunga athukku kooda neenga koopidunga okay ngala sari sir sari sir.

Executive: Yenna ungalukku dedicated ah intha account manager appoint pannirukkaen naan avangala account manager thaan pesuraen avanga account manager name vanthu ivanga Rohini nu solli namma Chennai team le irukkaanga okay ngala entha doubt irunthaalum neenga Rohini kku call pannalaam enakku um call pannalaam neenga sir enakku oruthar paathu irunthaare Kiran Kiran vanthu last month relieve aayittaaru sir actually intha month last month le irunthu illa neethu kooda enakku appo Kiran nu sollittu thaan paapa avarudaiya number illaiyo Kiran nu save panni vachirunthaen appo Kiran illaiyo number Kiran oda number okay aama office number kaatti submit pannirukkaanga documents mobile phone assets ellam vanthu submit pannirukkaanga oh innikku Kiran irunthu call enakku vanthirunthathu innaikkum enakku vanthirunthathu avar Rohini kku nu call panniruppaanga Kiran relieve aayittaaru appo Kiran nu solli ippo enakku account manager avar illa ippo inime aama aama Rohini thaan ungalukku yaaraa irunthaalum avangala avangaloda managers naan thaan aama okay right right naan marubadi unnodaiya movement irukkaathu okay okay Rohini paathuttaen sir paathuttaen dashboard le paathuttaen okay okay naan WhatsApp le kooda message panna number enna kooda share pannikkonga India mart manager Krishna kooda share pannikkonga sari okay sari okay sari okay okay screenshot mattum WhatsApp le anuppuren antha maari follow pannikkonga naan paathuttaen neenga sollumbothe naan paathuttaen antha ithu vanthu paathuttaen neenga solrathu puriyuthu contact buyer mela vanthu athu evvalavu years ethu ethu enna requirement evvalavu requirement post pannirukkaanga enna enna ithaa irukku ellame naan paathuttaen neenga solrathu theriyuthu enna nu okay okay naan paathuttaen oru productive ah irukkum okay ngala sari sari sari sari paathukkiren sari sari okay intha complaint close pannikkalaam oru feedback um ungalukku varum sari ngala athai mattum konjam sari sari okay thank you sir thank you sir thank you sir thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants refund for two useless buyleads.

- Customer explains issues with buyleads received.



Resolution:

- Explained that refunds for individual buyleads not possible.

- Advised to check buyer details before consuming buyleads.

- Executive will share screenshot of buyer details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share screenshot on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, complaint, buyers, account manager
